name: Dataset of repository sizes in CWL Viewer
description: This is a simple dataset showing the size in bytes of the repositories examined by https://view.commonwl.org/ sinze September 2018

distribution.name: Repository Sizes TSV
distribution.description: Tab-separated file. Executed du -s * on heater.cs.man.ac.uk:/data/git

distribution.name: Repository Sizes spreadsheet
distribution.description: OpenOffice spreadsheet that generates a chart. Imported from TSV.

aggregates.description: Line chart of repository sizes. Exported from spreadsheet.
Some log files from the server, not further categorized
